column2: # Use ggsave to save plot. I chose 6.5" wide because most word docs are 8.5" with 2 x 1" margins. Keep the height below 9.5" to save room for a caption. When you insert into your document, change the size to 6.5" wide to ensure that the plot looks visually the same.
ggsave(filename = "../Figures/Fig1.jpeg", plot = last_plot(), device = "jpeg", width = 7.0, height = 6.0, units = "in", dpi = 350)
